member.summary: Advances this enumerator to the next batch of entities. This will update the property.
member.param: The preferred number of entities to read for each batch.
The cancellation token.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Abstractions.IAsyncBatchEnumerator`1.SplitAsync(Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Abstractions.SplitOptions,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Splits off a new enumerator with the specified preference. After the operation this enumerator will contain the entities given by the split preference, and the new enumerator the remaining entities. The estimated total count will be updated.
member.param: The split options.
The cancellation token.
member.returns: New after performing split operation.
